trans-unit.source: Represents a data service primitive, complex, or entity type.
trans-unit.target: 表示資料服務基本類型、 複雜或實體類型。

trans-unit.source: Nested types are not supported as resource types.
trans-unit.target: 不支援巢狀型別當做資源類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a data service <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立資料服務的執行個體<xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: CLR type that represents the format inside the [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/add/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] runtime.
trans-unit.target: 代表內部格式的 CLR 型別[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/add/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]執行階段。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceTypeKind"></xref> of the resource type.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceTypeKind"></xref>資源類型。

trans-unit.source: Base type of the resource type as string.
trans-unit.target: 當做字串之資源類型的基底類型。

trans-unit.source: Namespace name of the resource type as string.
trans-unit.target: 當做字串之資源類型的命名空間名稱。

trans-unit.source: Name of the given resource type as string.
trans-unit.target: 當做字串之給定的資源類型的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Boolean value that indicates whether the resource type is an abstract type.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出資源類型是否為抽象型別。

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref href="System.Data.Services.Common.EntityPropertyMappingAttribute"></xref> for the resource type.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Data.Services.Common.EntityPropertyMappingAttribute"></xref>資源類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Services.Common.EntityPropertyMappingAttribute"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Data.Services.Common.EntityPropertyMappingAttribute"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: Adds the property supplied by the resourceProperty parameter to the type.
trans-unit.target: 將所提供的屬性加入 resourceProperty 參數的類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceProperty"></xref> property to be added.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceProperty"></xref>要加入的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to base resource type, if any.
trans-unit.target: 取得基底資源類型的參考，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType"></xref> of the base type.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType"></xref>基底類型。

trans-unit.source: Get whether the corresponding instance type represents the CLR type of this entity.
trans-unit.target: 取得是否對應的執行個體類型表示此實體的 CLR 型別。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the instance type represents a CLR type; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果執行個體型別代表 CLR 型別。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a placeholder to hold custom state information about a resource type that is defined by the developer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定預留位置以容納開發人員所定義的資源類型的自訂狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Custom state information defined by the developer.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員所定義的自訂狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of properties for this type.
trans-unit.target: 取得此類型的屬性清單。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>的<xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the full name of the resource.
trans-unit.target: 取得資源的完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: The full name of the resource type as string.
trans-unit.target: 當做字串之資源類型完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets a resource type that represent a primitive type when given a <xref:System.Type> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示一個基本型別時指定的資源類型<xref:System.Type>物件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type> type from which to get the primitive type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>輸入要從中取得基本類型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The resource type.
trans-unit.target: 資源類型。

trans-unit.source: Reference to the CLR type that this resource represents.
trans-unit.target: 此資源所代表的 CLR 型別參考。

trans-unit.source: The instance type as a <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體類型，做為<xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether this is an abstract type.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，指出這是否為抽象類型。

trans-unit.source: True if <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType"></xref> is abstract.
trans-unit.target: True，否則<xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType"></xref>是抽象的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that is true if the resource type includes a default stream.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定布林值，這個值為 true，如果資源類型包含預設資料流。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that is true if the resource type includes a default stream.
trans-unit.target: 布林值為 true，如果資源類型包含預設資料流。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the resource type has open properties.
trans-unit.target: 取得資源類型是否有開放式屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the resource type has open properties defined; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果資源類型有開放式屬性的定義;否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that is true if this resource type has been set to read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值為 true，如果此資源類型已設為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: True if this resource type has been set to read-only; otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: 則為 true，如果此資源類型已設為唯讀。否則為 false。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of key properties for this type
trans-unit.target: 取得此類型的索引鍵屬性清單

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>的<xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of properties declared by this resource type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個資源類型所宣告的屬性清單。

trans-unit.source: The LoadPropertiesDeclaredOnThisType method enables you to defer loading of the properties of a resource type.
trans-unit.target: LoadPropertiesDeclaredOnThisType 方法可讓您延後載入的資源類型的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This LoadPropertiesDeclaredOnThisType method is called only one time when either <xref:System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType.Properties%2A> or <xref:System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType.PropertiesDeclaredOnThisType%2A> properties are accessed.
trans-unit.target: 會呼叫這個 LoadPropertiesDeclaredOnThisType 方法只能有一個時間可能是<xref:System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType.Properties%2A>或<xref:System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType.PropertiesDeclaredOnThisType%2A>屬性存取。</xref:System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType.PropertiesDeclaredOnThisType%2A> </xref:System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType.Properties%2A>

trans-unit.source: The list of properties declared on this type.
trans-unit.target: 此類型上宣告的屬性清單。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the resource type.
trans-unit.target: 取得資源類型的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Name of the resource type as string.
trans-unit.target: 當做字串之資源類型的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the namespace of the resource type.
trans-unit.target: 取得資源類型的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Namespace of the resource type as string.
trans-unit.target: 當做字串之資源類型的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of properties declared of this type that includes only properties defined on the type, not in the base type.
trans-unit.target: 取得宣告只會包含屬性類型，不會在基底類型上定義這個類型的屬性清單。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>的<xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: List of properties declared on this type.
trans-unit.target: 此類型上宣告的屬性清單。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>的<xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceTypeKind"></xref> for the type.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceTypeKind"></xref>類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceTypeKind"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceTypeKind"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the resource type to read-only.
trans-unit.target: 將資源類型設定為唯讀。
